ygData.subject: Re: New Spells Info
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t feel to bad about ensnare.  I just got finished discussing root and ensnare with a couple of high level druids on a message board.  Basically they
ygData.messageBody:
>

Don't feel to bad about ensnare. I just got finished "discussing" root and
ensnare with a couple of high level druids on a message board. Basically they
wanted a reliable root spell like wizards instead of their ensnare line. I
guess its true, The grass is always greener on the other side.

>
>
> Bonds of force is NOT as good as the Druid form of Ensnare at my current
> level 29...
> It is resisted about the same amount as Enstill and the length of effect is
> much like our root... random.
> The druid version of ensnare is not resisted as much, and when it sticks it
> always lasts for a minute or two. I see a few uses for this spell but I am
> dissapointed. I would rather have the druid version of ensnare for a single
> mob.
>
